item.title: Multiple relationships with goals don't work, try goal monogamy
item.description: I’ve been wanting to start a blog for awhile, it’s been one of my goals. Unfortunately, there are quite a few other goals I haven’t seemed to be able to make much progress on in the last year or so. From loosing 10 lbs, coding every day, to building a camp kitchen for my car. All of my goals remain somewhat in-progress or potentially further away than when I started (in the case of my weight).
